title: Lowest Methane Emissions from Transport
description: In 2023, Dominica recorded one of the lowest methane emissions from transport in the world, with a value of just 0.0001 Mt CO2e.

title: Minimal Carbon Dioxide Emissions from Waste
description: Dominica's carbon dioxide emissions from waste were among the lowest globally in 2023, at 0.0001 Mt CO2e.

title: Negligible Nitrous Oxide Emissions from Transport
description: In 2023, Dominica had one of the lowest nitrous oxide emissions from transport, measuring 0.0003 Mt CO2e.

title: High Merchandise Import Residuals
description: In 2023, Dominica's merchandise imports by the reporting economy had a residual of 3.51% of total merchandise imports, one of the highest globally.

title: Significant Negative Net National Savings
description: In 2018, Dominica experienced a net national savings rate of -25.30% of GNI, indicating a significant economic challenge.

title: Minimal Public and Publicly Guaranteed Debt
description: In 2015, Dominica had one of the lowest levels of public and publicly guaranteed debt, valued at $31,000.

title: Low Mortality Rate for Ages 10-14
description: In 2023, Dominica reported only one death among individuals aged 10-14, reflecting a low mortality rate in this age group.
